Articles.Content:
OR i could be some docking prat or even Robat proba and repir tools form space staions!

It's already been stated many times that docking is NOT coming in this update. Space stations, scientific probes or repair tools aren't coming either.
oh by the i one pic of the planet i made here it is. chick on the link to see it and it is amnimated but the froums will not let me post it so here is one pic of it
Moderator Comment: Please stay on topic and DO NOT mention docking in this thread, it is not coming in .17 and it has been beaten to death
ok the d word will be in any replys anymore.
http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/album.php?albumid=5&attachmentid=31063

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/album.php?albumid=5&attachmentid=31063

This looks a lot better in my opinion because it gives it a more mysterious sort of feel to the planet.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/album.php?albumid=5&attachmentid=31063

I like it! If it's a Jupiter analog, I feel like it should have a large storm on it.

Lookin good nova!

Im wondering if its possible to animate the planet's texture over time as to get some swirling effects in the atomosphere. It would be a really neat effect especially when warping. Also it would serve to give the planet a more fluid feel.

IIRC unity can do animated textures. However, i am assuming that the planet is a simple sphere map.
Just one qustion what dose the insde of a gas gaint look like. and will we be able to enter the planets atmostsharpe

The color looks very good indeed. Maybe it lacks a little turbulence between on the stripes edges.

I really hope there's a moon close enough that the Green Monster fills almost all of the sky.

Like Jupiter in this video:

I believe that moon distance earth actually would be inside Jupiters atomosphere.

I cant wait to drop a kerbal into it to see whats inside!

I believe that moon distance earth actually would be inside Jupiters atomosphere.

I cant wait to drop a kerbal into it to see whats inside!

Actually, I think it's moon-earth distance from the top of the atmosphere, not the center of the planet.

If you must, here's what the real cosmic ballet of moons around our gas giants looks like:

When 0.17 arrives, I'm sure I'll lose many hours simply admiring the show at high timewarp speed

So let me get this straight:

Confirmed: 7 planets

Mercury-Jupiter analogue

7th planet close to Kerbol

Named "Charr"

5 moons 4 around Jupiter analogue

New kerbal named "Kurt J Kerman" w/ 3D glasses

Am I right?

So let me get this straight:

Confirmed: 7 planets

Mercury-Jupiter analogue

7th planet close to Kerbol

Named "Charr"

5 moons 4 around Jupiter analogue

New kerbal named "Kurt J Kerman" w/ 3D glasses

Am I right?

I don't know about the 7 planets, unless that is the total for the Kerbol system in the final game. I thought they were only adding 4 planets for this update? Other than that it sounds about right.

Also the planet names with number indicating position in the Kerbol system:

1-Charr

2-Eve (called Eve by Nova on the stream so I'll take it as a confirmation)

===

4-??

5-Meander
thats the perfect shade, it gives it a creepy feel

It's already been stated many times that docking is NOT coming in this update. Space stations, scientific probes or repair tools aren't coming either.

Is that stuff coming not at alll then?. also with the colour of planets they will looks so much different once we get clouds ones with any type of atmosphere that is

This thread is for discussing the next update, NOT whether Kurt "deserves" a light-hearted reference in the game... You should be glad he even let us join his stream in the first place, instead of just brushing us off and inviting some more well-known developers.

Edited August 11, 2012 by NovaSilisko

Stay on topic people or we'll start handing out infractions, you've been warned.

Edited August 11, 2012 by Damion Rayne
This update is for sure the one I have been most excited for. Other planets bring a whole new layer of space travel into the game.
I'm bouncing in my seat for this one... and we probably have another month ahead of us before I can crash my Kerbs into something other than Kerbin, Minmus and the Mun.

Also guys, from what I heard in Kurt's live stream. I think it was Harv who said that there might not be more solar systems. There will just be dozens of planets to make it a nice solar system. (Correct me if I'm wrong, that's what I could hear but it might not be right)

Also guys, from what I heard in Kurt's live stream. I think it was Harv who said that there might not be more solar systems. There will just be dozens of planets to make it a nice solar system. (Correct me if I'm wrong, that's what I could hear but it might not be right)

Well he said he didn't want randomly generated solar systems because then people couldn't compare their achivments

Well he said he didn't want randomly generated solar systems because then people couldn't compare their achivments

Yeah, he said that too! So no random solar systems in the game

Just a quick note, i noticed some promotion from ING..

(laught so hard when they launched the wacky rockets..)

Thread locked for multiple off-topic posts. It's suggested the OP start a new thread, and as a note the Mod team will be watching this new thread very closely. We are tired of warning you, and will now hand out infractions instantly for off-topic posting.

-DR
